column2: "Na da no ara Jakob yiyii mpɔnkyenyin a hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee nye ntokowa ntokowa no; nye mpɔnkyeber a hɔn ho yɛ woranworan nye ntokowa ntokowa no nyinara

column2: "na ɔmaa ndaansa kwan daa ɔnoara nye Jakob ntamu: na Jakob nyɛɛn Laban no nguan nkaa no."
"Na Jakob faa sɛsɛ dua nye almɔnd dua nye odwon dua mbaa momon; na oyiyii ho nsema efufuw
column3: na ɔmaa mbaa no ho efufuw no puepuei."

column2: "Na ɔdze mbaa no a oyiyii ho no guu nguan no hɔn tsentsen do wɔ nsuka a ɔwɔ mu mbrɛ nguan no ba hɔ bɔnom nsu no mu; na wɔba bɔnom nsu a nna wɔfow hɔnho."

column2: "Na Jakob paa nguambaa no na ɔmaa nguan no hɔn enyim kɔr Laban nguan no mu nsensanee nsensanee nye etuntum no nyinara hɔn do; na ɔyɛɛ narankasa no nguankuw wɔ nkyɛn
